alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Columbia, northwestern Burke and western Richmond Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Wrens, or 14 miles southwest of Fort Gordon, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Martinez, Fort Gordon, Hephzibah, Augusta Mall, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Blythe, Keysville, Leitner Lake Conference Center, Liberty Park Community Center, Evans Medical Center, Bath-Edie, Pea Patch Aerodrome, Blanchard Woods Park, Blanchard Park, Columbia County Exhibition Center, Waverly, Patriots Park and Windy Ridge Estates. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 186 and 199. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
